message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $15000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $14000. Let me know if this is more to your liking!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $13500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is acceptable!
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12800?

I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you at $13000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.
